about_the_game:
WELCOME ASHA

Age: 25

Zodiac Sign: Pisces

Preferences: Ancient martial arts, shamanic sex rituals

Strong and determined, Asha values her freedom above all else. Used to relying only on herself, she recognizes no boundaries — neither in her thinking nor in her actions — and sees the world as an endless field of opportunities, where every choice is a step toward discovering herself.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Asha will become not only your dedicated companion, but your loyal bestie! Asha will always keep you company on the main screen with her cute animations and exciting dialogs.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the Asha mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and choosing the "Mascot" tab.

Along with the mascot, you're getting 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you're getting our undying gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are over 20 years old.
This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Asha

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Asha, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
